page.title: 11HOUSING-RAVENSCROFT ESTATE
page.content: The Ravenscroft council estate was built fifty years ago but the houses are still in a reasonable state of repair.The gardens are well tended and people tend birds, animals and trees well.The woodland surrounding the estate is full of common species of bird and wild vegetation.The shopping area is well used although people complain about the lack of variety.The frequent bus service is popular although the buses tend to travel slowly. The estate itself is clean except for the vandalised shopping centre.There is some accommodation specially for the elderly who enjoy living here.Few people attend nightschool as transport and lack of money are problems. Children tend to get bored as there are very few play areas for them.On the whole,people seemed happy.
